name: Business Plan Challenge
description: Submit your innovative business plan and win funding for your startup.
instruction: Write a comprehensive business plan following the provided guidelines.

name: Medical Research Symposium
description: Present your latest medical research findings and contribute to scientific advancements.
instruction: Prepare a research paper and presentation slides on your medical research.

name: article Marathon
description: Compose compelling articles on various topics and showcase your writing skills.
instruction: Submit well-researched articles based on the given prompts.

name: Gaming Hackathon
description: Develop innovative games within a limited timeframe and compete against others.
instruction: Create a functional game prototype adhering to the specified theme.

name: Entrepreneurship Challenge
description: Pitch your innovative business idea and compete for investment opportunities.
instruction: Prepare a detailed business pitch deck and present it to the judging panel.

name: Medical Case Study Competition
description: Analyze complex medical cases and propose effective treatment strategies.
instruction: Analyze the provided medical case and outline a comprehensive treatment plan.

name: Creative Writing Challenge
description: Craft imaginative stories or poems and showcase your creativity.
instruction: Submit captivating stories or poems exploring various themes.

name: E-Sports Tournament
description: Compete in thrilling gaming tournaments across multiple game titles.
instruction: Participate in multiplayer gaming tournaments with defined rules and matches.

name: Business Innovation Summit
description: Showcase groundbreaking business strategies and compete for investment opportunities.
instruction: Present innovative business ideas and strategies in a concise pitch.

name: Medical Imaging Challenge
description: Utilize advanced imaging techniques to diagnose medical conditions accurately.
instruction: Analyze provided medical images to identify and diagnose abnormalities.

name: Content Writing Marathon
description: Create engaging content across different formats and attract a global audience.
instruction: Write compelling content pieces targeting diverse audiences and niches.

name: Mobile Gaming Challenge
description: Develop addictive mobile games and compete for popularity and innovation.
instruction: Create mobile game apps that captivate and engage users.

name: Startup Pitch Competition
description: Pitch your startup idea and secure funding from renowned investors.
instruction: Craft a persuasive pitch deck and showcase your business model.

name: Healthcare Innovation Challenge
description: Innovate healthcare solutions that enhance patient care and treatment.
instruction: Design innovative healthcare solutions addressing current challenges.

name: Technical Writing Competition
description: Demonstrate technical writing skills across diverse technical domains.
instruction: Compose technical documents presenting complex information clearly.

name: Online Gaming Championship
description: Compete in multiplayer online gaming tournaments for cash prizes.
instruction: Participate in organized online gaming tournaments across multiple genres.

name: Tech Startup Innovation Challenge
description: Pitch tech-driven startup ideas and win investment opportunities.
instruction: Create a comprehensive presentation highlighting tech startup concepts.

name: Biomedical Research Competition
description: Advance biomedical research with innovative experiments and studies.
instruction: Submit detailed biomedical research reports along with experimental findings.

name: Travel Writing Contest
description: Craft captivating travel stories and share unique experiences.
instruction: Write compelling travel narratives exploring diverse destinations.

name: Retro Gaming Challenge
description: Compete in classic gaming tournaments celebrating retro game titles.
instruction: Participate in challenges featuring retro gaming classics.

name: Mobile Game Design Jam
description: Design captivating mobile game concepts and explore new gameplay mechanics.
instruction: Design innovative game concepts with intuitive and immersive gameplay.
